programme.title: The Collectors
programme.desc: Commemorating Singapores 60th year of independence through the quiet beauty of everyday objects, such as old letters And cinema memorabilia, and the people who treasure them.

programme.title: Bride From The Past [Behind the Scenes]
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of Bride from the Past And discover how this suspenseful supernatural drama weaves together love, mystery, and ghost-marriage folklore to deliver a moving story that transcends time.

programme.title: Love on a Shoestring
programme.desc: This romantic comedy takes a light-hearted look at the lives of three couples with varying financial perspectives, as they navigate the delicate balance between matters of the heart and money.

programme.title: Tuesday Report: Kinships
programme.desc: Parental love has an unparalleled influence on a childs character, personality and life, but parents are not born perfect. They too, must go through a profound learning process.

programme.title: DT Jamboree S3 Special Highlights
programme.desc: Kids reveal their favorite songs and dance moves! From cute gestures to cheerful shouts, the Jamboree routines bring laughter, energy, and pure childhood joy in just two minutes.

programme.title: Future Girl
programme.desc: In this Singapore kids drama series, Min Min And her good friend discovers an app that predicts the future. How will they use it to protect people from impending danger?

programme.title: Monsters in the Forbidden City S3: Secret of Time Prison
programme.desc: In the new season, the Kissing Beast inadvertently transforms into an ordinary human, leading to amusing explorations of the human world and a quest to solve mysteries.

programme.title: Little Hakka
programme.desc: Black market traders stole the Sea Spirit Pearl to control the Spirits, causing them to lose control And resulting in disasters. Ah Liang must retrieve the Pearl to restore mountain And the underwater world.

programme.title: The Star Athlete
programme.desc: Qi Yuwu And Lee Teng lead their respective teams of artists into training under various star athletes. As they compete, every episode concludes with an MVP selected as a weekly winner.

programme.title: Love Again
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, retired professor Shen Zhuo Ran thought he would live out his days in solitude. However, encouraged by an old friend, he embarks on a journey of blind dates.

programme.title: Fixing Fate
programme.desc: Funeral worker Tan Choon Lin finds a time-traveling lighter, which sends him back to 1930s. But his scheme to profit from this backfire, altering history And entangling him with famous figures.

programme.title: Freedom Travelers
programme.desc: Hosted by the famous YouTuber Ben Wu, this travel program takes you to little-known corners around the world, delving into foreign cultures and exploring real life experiences and adventures.

programme.title: Tuesday Report: Kinships

programme.title: Cemburu Seorang Perempuan

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Rafael mula semakin rapat dengan Arissa. Zarina merasakan yang dia ada peluang untuk memenangi hati Rafael. Zaki mula merasakan yang semua orang semakin berubah dan menjauhkan diri darinya.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Zarina sudah semakin rapat dengan Arissa dan mula dapat menerima Arissa. Zarina semakin mendambakan cinta Rafael, tetapi Rafael lebih memberi perhatian pada Arissa. Rafael masih belum dapat berterus terang tentang kemalangan Zariman.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Qistina hairan dengan kelakuan Maisara yang cuba melarikan diri dari Nazril. Maisara mengiyakan yang dia betul-betul jatuh cinta dengan Nazril, tetapi dia mula risau kerana merasakan jodoh mereka tidak panjang.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara cemburu melihat Nazril dan Nurul Huda bersama walaupun Qistina dan Izuddin ada bersama dan berterus terang dengan Nazril bahawa dia sangat benci Nurul Huda. Kerana Nazril tidak mahu menyakiti hati isterinya, dia menyatakan perkahwinan mereka bahagia di depan Nurul Huda dan yang lain, demi memuaskan hati Maisara.

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Zarina sudah semakin rapat dengan Arissa dan mula dapat menerima Arissa. Zarina semakin mendambakan cinta Rafael, tetapi Rafael lebih memberi perhatian pada Arissa. Rafael masih belum dapat berterus terang tentang kemalangan Zariman.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Qistina hairan dengan kelakuan Maisara yang cuba melarikan diri dari Nazril. Maisara mengiyakan yang dia betul-betul jatuh cinta dengan Nazril, tetapi dia mula risau kerana merasakan jodoh mereka tidak panjang.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara cemburu melihat Nazril dan Nurul Huda bersama walaupun Qistina dan Izuddin ada bersama dan berterus terang dengan Nazril bahawa dia sangat benci Nurul Huda. Kerana Nazril tidak mahu menyakiti hati isterinya, dia menyatakan perkahwinan mereka bahagia di depan Nurul Huda dan yang lain, demi memuaskan hati Maisara.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Maisara kelihatan kurang senang apabila semua orang mengatakan dia bertuah menjadi isteri Nazril, dan tertanya-tanya samada Nazril tidak bertuah memilikinya. Nazril pula rasa bersalah kerana merahsiakan perkahwinan itu dari keluarganya kerana dia telah memungkiri janjinya sendiri.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Walaupun Nazril tidak putus menunjukkan kasih sayangnya dari hari pertama mereka bersama, tetapi Maisara lebih kepada berjaga-jaga supaya tidak tewas dengan jerat kasih sayang yang ditunjukkan oleh Nazril. Maisara bengang Nazril membawanya berpindah ke rumah sewa yang serba serbinya kurang berbanding banglo mewah papanya.

programme.title: Rindu Awak Separuh Nyawa
programme.desc: Kemahuan Nazril supaya Maisara mula bertudung ke kelas menjadi perdebatan. Maisara semakin begang dengan peraturan yang ditetapkan oleh Nazril dan Nazril juga tidak mahu Maisara menyakit hati papanya lagi dan nasihat itu didengar endah tak endah oleh Maisara.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News, information and analysis of German and European topics.

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: The Day presents the past 24 hours: close to the people, with a clear focus on the essential issue, and guests who outline their viewpoints on the stories of the day.

programme.title: Menanti Hari Itu
programme.desc: Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu terhadap anak kandungnya yang tidak pernah terpadam meskipun si anak menjauhkan diri akibat hasutan keluarga angkatnya sendiri.

programme.title: Kecundang Sebelum Menjanda
programme.desc: Hari terbahagia dalam hidup Nora berubah menjadi suram bila tunangnya menarik diri pada hari pernikahan mereka. Tambah buruk lagi, hari selepas tragedi itu asyik berulang atas sebab-sebab misteri.

programme.title: Aku Raja Lawak
programme.desc: Silah nak jadi pelawak yang terkenal, cuma di kampungnya tak ada peluang pekerjaan pelawak sepenuh masa. Tapi dia tetap mendapat sokongan padu daripada peminat nombor satunya iaitu Faris, anaknya.

programme.title: Bayangan Emilia
programme.desc: Rita berpindah masuk ke banglo Ungku Mahmud dan mula merasai akan kehadiran roh yang seperti tidak senang dengan kehadirannya disitu. Apakah misteri di sebalik rumah banglo tersebut?

programme.title: Oh Speak English Please
programme.desc: Kisah Sally anak remaja moden yang merasa malu dengan ibunya kerana tidak pandai berbahasa Inggeris dan berketrampilan agak kekampungan. Lakonan Rozita Che Wan dan Zahirah MacWilson.

programme.title: Striker Hati Ayah
programme.desc: Sofia susah untuk memilih antara dua calon, Raf atau Noah. Lalu meminta pendapat ayahnya, Adam. Kini dua lelaki tersebut terpaksa memenangi hati ayah Sofia, seorang peminat fanatik bola.

programme.title: Gebu Gebu Manis
programme.desc: Kisah Hamdi dan Dolah yang memulakan perniagaan dodol tetapi sering disabotaj oleh Amira yang cemburu dengan perniagaan dua orang sahabat ini.

programme.title: Wartawan Kampung
programme.desc: Mustaqim yang tidak habis belajar, pulang ke kampung mewujudkan laman web kampung disokong Tok Ketua Kampung Kambing. Untuk mempopularkan laman web itu, Mak Jah dan Mak Temah dilantik menjadi wartawan kampung untuk bahagian berita gosip dan hangat yang merancang untuk merampas laman web itu untuk kepunyaan sendiri. Akhirnya, berita menjadi finah, kampung pula menjadi porak-poranda.

programme.title: Lukisan Cinta
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Khairul dan Natasha saling mencintai tetapi ditentang bapa Natasha kerana Khairul memilih kerjaya sebagai pelukis. Apakah kesudahan cinta mereka?

programme.title: Laksa Di Ambang Wati
programme.desc: Demi mendapatkan resepi laksa terbaik di Pulau Pinang, Mail dan kawan- kawan sanggup berbaik dengan Wati, gadis yang tak berapa lawa. Namun setelah Wati disunting oleh usahawan kosmetik terkenal, hidup Wati berubah dan Mail betul- betul jatuh cinta pada Wati.

programme.title: Perempuan Disarung Ungu
programme.desc: Kisah Marziah yang terpaksa menjalani hukuman penjara dalam keadaan mengandung kerana dituduh membunuh. Siapakah dalang yang sebenarnya bertanggungjawab? Lakonan Tya Ariffin dan Shukri Yahya.

programme.title: Hari Terakhir Seorang Pengurus
programme.desc: Kisah seorang pengurus yang tertekan dengan bebanan kerja mengambil keputusan untuk membunuh diri untuk memberi pengajaran kepada majikannya

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Asam Pedas Cendol Sejoli
programme.desc: Karim adalah pemilik kedai cendol bersebelahan dengan kedai asam pedas Kalsom. Mereka bermusuhan, tetapi anak mereka Kinah dan Khalil mencintai satu sama lain, dan terpaksa menyembunyikan perkara ini bagi mengelakkan perang antara dua kedai mereka.

programme.title: Lukisan Cinta
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Khairul dan Natasha saling mencintai tetapi ditentang bapa Natasha kerana Khairul memilih kerjaya sebagai pelukis. Apakah kesudahan cinta mereka?

programme.title: Patah Seribu
programme.desc: Ella returns from London, to spend her summer vacation back home, as Ellas mother forces her to celebrate the mothers 20th wedding anniversary with her stepfather. She meets Andy who practically ignores her all the time, at the ceremony. Andy, an ex- gangster of Chow Kit, intends to turn over a new leaf as he feels responsible for his mother being paralysed. Andys arrogance caught Ellas attention and this makes her love Andy even more after finding out his past story.

programme.title: Musnahkan Pelamin Anganku
programme.desc: Mikael yang merupakan seorang wedding planner menerima tawaran besar untuk menjayakan sebuah majlis perkahwinan pelanggannya. Namun majlis perkahwinan tersebut merupakan majlis bekas isterinya.

programme.title: Dua
programme.desc: Kisah Farhan yang kehilangan kembarnya Fahrin dalam satu kemalangan tragis. Dia kemudiannya mengambil-alih kehidupan Fahrin namun terperangkap dalam sebuah cinta tiga segi pula. Lakonan Eusoff Hashim dan Sharifah Sakinah.

programme.title: Racun Menantu
programme.desc: After marrying Zain, Sara lived in the same house with Pak Dolah, her father-in-law. Because of the familys grudge, Sara started making trouble by seducing her own father-in-law.

programme.title: Menantuku Rock
programme.desc: Ibu Salina ingin melihat anaknya itu berkahwin. Salina dengan bantuan Pak Mujid mula membuat senarai calon suami dan pelbagai senario lucu berlaku sehingga rahsia lama timbul semula.

programme.title: Cerai
programme.desc: Pengalaman berkurung dengan pasangan selama musim PKP memaksa dua pasangan suami isteri menilai semula perkahwinan mereka yang telah disalah ertikan selama ini.

programme.title: Hingga Jumpa Lagi
programme.desc: Eva is diagnosed with cancer and prays that she could travel back to the past in order to prevent the love between her and her husband so that her husband can lead a happy life. Her prayer is granted

programme.title: I Heart You Cik Yah
programme.desc: Zulkefli and Badariah are always arguing, but in order to prevent the factory where they work from being closed by Qarina, they must work together. Out of hatred, they start feeling for each other.

programme.title: Jihan Nak Displin Anak
programme.desc: Jihan dan suami kalut apabila anak mereka tidak mahu pulang beraya di kampung. Mereka cuba untuk mendisiplinkan anak mereka sebelum hari raya

programme.title: Satu Kampung Dua Orang
programme.desc: Selepas banjir besar melanda, semua penduduk kampung berpindah kerana kampung mereka tidak lagi selamat. Hanya dua beradik yang enggan berpindah atas sebab dan alasan mereka tersendiri.

programme.title: Jamil Balik Kampung
programme.desc: Kisah perjalanan Jamil pulang ke kampung untuk meminang kekasihnya setelah pinangannya pernah ditolak beberapa kali. Berjayakah misi Jamil kali ini?

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Sampai Nanti
programme.desc: Kyle dan Milly bertemu kembali setelah 10 tahun terpisah dan cinta lama kembali terjalin. Tetapi adakah cinta mereka akan terus kekal hingga ke akhirnya?

programme.title: Asam Pedas Cendol Sejoli
programme.desc: Karim adalah pemilik kedai cendol bersebelahan dengan kedai asam pedas Kalsom. Mereka bermusuhan, tetapi anak mereka Kinah dan Khalil mencintai satu sama lain, dan terpaksa menyembunyikan perkara ini bagi mengelakkan perang antara dua kedai mereka.

programme.desc: An international news bulletin, presented live from the newsroom.

programme.title: Project Legion
programme.desc: A young man trapped in his apartment with a swarm of demons outside his door must find a way to survive the night and escape from apartment 213.

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers. She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: During WWII, the American army have raced their way through the countryside on the border of France entering Nazi Germany. Hitler has deployed his secret weapon. Lieutenant Frank Ross encounters the Nazi weapon and an intense aerial battle ensues.

programme.title: Johnny And Clyde
programme.desc: Johnny and Clyde are two serial killers who are on an endless crime spree. They decide to assemble a group of criminals and misfits to steal from Alanas casino and pull off the heist of the century.

programme.title: Mojave Diamonds
programme.desc: A former MMA fighter and his brothers must rescue their kidnapped family from a dangerous crime syndicate after $50M of illegal diamonds gets stolen.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - The Spyce Of Life
programme.desc: Returning from a romantic getaway with Ava, Max finds himself on the wrong side of the law yet again. Now blackmailed by MI6, Max must spy on two suspected terrorists; Aziz and Omar, who are regular customers at his club. Accompanied by his London crime family, Max breaks into Omars country estate and discovers his sinister plan. With everything on the line, Max must race to uncover a highly skilled hackers identity before its too late.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Hayes Hodges, an attorney, takes up the offer of defending his friend Colonel Terry Childers, accused of ordering his squad to open fire on a group of demonstrators.

programme.title: Pocket Listing
programme.desc: Double crosses, adultery, murder, mistaken identity, and revenge ensue when a mysterious power player and his sultry wife hire a disgraced Los Angeles property broker to discreetly market and sell their Malibu villa.

programme.title: The Legion
programme.desc: Noreno, a half-Roman, is entrusted with the mission of crossing the snowy mountains of Armenia, swarming with Parthian patrols, to seek help for his slowly dying men.

programme.title: Hunting Games
programme.desc: Two dangerous armed men must hunt each other and fight to death over millions of dollars in cash in this high octane wilderness survival story.

programme.title: In Isolation
programme.desc: Four friends wanted to get away from it all in a remote country house but when a mysterious injured man turns up on their doorstep telling tales of a city ravaged by a epidemic and the looters who have pursued him, the friends rally to help.

programme.title: Blood Of Redemption
programme.desc: When the most powerful criminal empire in the land comes crumbling down from within, it is up to a former henchman to put the puzzle pieces together in order to find those responsible and extract revenge.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - Serenas Game
programme.desc: Refusing to comply with Tommys demands, Max and Paul conspire to have the British gangster eliminated and Serena arrested. With Tommy dead and Serena in handcuffs, it appears as though Max has succeeded. His plan goes awry, however, when MI6 force Max to help Serena bring down her employers: the Russian mob. Torn between a life of crime with Serena or happiness with Ava, nothing is ever simple in the life of Max Mayfair.

programme.title: The Commando
programme.desc: A DEA agent returns home with PTSD after a botched mission and must now protect his family from a home invasion when a recently freed convict and his henchmen come after their stash of millions hidden inside of the agents home.

programme.title: American Sicario
programme.desc: Based on the true story, Edgar Valdez, drug lord and cartel leader, is betrayed by one of the brothers. Seeking retribution, Valdez will risk it all to gain control of the Feliz cartel.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: The Jews of Eastern Europe are being massacred by the thousands. Galvanised into action after the death of his wife, Hungarian barrister Sonson finds himself leading an inspirational fight back against the increasingly desperate and dangerous Nazis.

programme.title: Broadcast
programme.desc: After a billionaire creates a drug called INOC which stops the aging process, the future of a world where death no longer exists is seen. The story of the fate of mankind is told while also revealing an elusive truth to its unknowing spectator.

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page, a brilliant mother-daughter swindler team, target the citys wealthiest men. Max marries them and then sues for alimony after she catches them involved in an affair with Page.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: After planning a perfect heist, Nick is ready to score. One problem, his girl and the crew, have other ideas. They take Nick down in a hail of bullets but Nick doesnt die and in a race for his life, seeks revenge one target at a time.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Guns
programme.desc: A deputized gunslinger takes up the call to hunt down the last Cowboy, the chase is on and the bullets fly and only one of these hardened men can survive.

programme.title: Operation Sea Wolf
programme.desc: The German Navy and the last remaining U-Boats, were formed together for one last mission to attack the United States Homeland.

programme.title: Mayfair - Shooting Paul
programme.desc: Hoping to put the past behind him and go legit, Max is persuaded by Paul to open a new Mister Mayfair club in Portugal. Conflict, however, seems to follow Max wherever he goes. Drawn into a violent turf war between London Gangsters and the Italian Mafia, his relationship with Ava is jeopardised by the arrival of his former flame, Serena. Maxs carefully crafted world seems to be collapsing around him. With his familys lives on the line, Max is blackmailed by British crime boss, Tommy, to assassinate his best friend, Paul.

programme.title: Broken Star
programme.desc: Abandoned by her friends and family and with her career in jeopardy, starlet Markey Marlowe is sequestered in a duplex with a reclusive landlord who just may be more dangerous than she is.

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: A female FBI agent is offered millions to help a thief escape from a hijacked airplane.

programme.title: Clean
programme.desc: Tormented by his criminal past, Clean attempts a quiet life caring for his community and as a mentor to his young neighbor Dianda. When local gang violence puts his neighbors life in danger, Clean finds himself returning to his violent past.

programme.title: Centigrade
programme.desc: A married couple find themselves trapped in their frozen vehicle after a blizzard and struggle to survive amid plunging temperatures and unforeseen obstacles.

programme.title: The Commando
programme.desc: A DEA agent returns home with PTSD after a botched mission and must now protect his family from a home invasion when a recently freed convict and his henchmen come after their stash of millions hidden inside of the agents home.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - The Spyce Of Life
programme.desc: Returning from a romantic getaway with Ava, Max finds himself on the wrong side of the law yet again. Now blackmailed by MI6, Max must spy on two suspected terrorists; Aziz and Omar, who are regular customers at his club. Accompanied by his London crime family, Max breaks into Omars country estate and discovers his sinister plan. With everything on the line, Max must race to uncover a highly skilled hackers identity before its too late.

programme.title: Blood Of Redemption
programme.desc: When the most powerful criminal empire in the land comes crumbling down from within, it is up to a former henchman to put the puzzle pieces together in order to find those responsible and extract revenge.

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page, a brilliant mother-daughter swindler team, target the citys wealthiest men. Max marries them and then sues for alimony after she catches them involved in an affair with Page.

programme.title: Bruce Willis: All American Hero
programme.desc: Bruce Willis became a star with his iconic role as John McClane in Die Hard, leading to a legendary career with over 100 films. Known for his charm and humor, his career faced a tragic setback in 2022.

programme.title: The Rock: Moving Mountains
programme.desc: Wrestling star turned Hollywood megastar carved himself a path to becoming king of the entertainment industry and brings his one of a kind charisma, charm and signature smile to everything he touches.

programme.title: Wild Portugal
programme.desc: Portugals diverse landscapes host unique wildlife. From Cork Oak forests in the south to deciduous forests in the north, follow iconic species through key life phases, from mating to survival in the wild.

programme.title: Wild Portugal
programme.desc: Rivers are lifelines in Wild Portugal, connecting mountains to the sea. Discover the Deer stag, frogs spring rituals,and Grebes dances,along with other animals and landscapes along these vital waterways.

programme.title: Wild Portugal
programme.desc: Portugals coastal waters and the Azores archipelago boast rich ecosystems. Explore the diverse species living in these waters and discover their unique lives in this revealing episode.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story
programme.desc: Ahi has now been open for over 18 months. Ben Bayly is keen to revisit some of the people who make up the Ahi menu, starting in Awarua.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story
programme.desc: Ben continues his South Island trip, visiting the Mackenzie Country, the Canterbury Plains and the Rakaia Gorge.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story
programme.desc: Ben travels to the Marlborough Sounds where he goes spearfishing for Butterfish and checks out the Farmers Market before heading to Nelson to visit New Zealands oldest pub.

programme.title: Armstrong
programme.desc: Dramatic, moving and insightful, Armstrong tells the definitive life story of Neil Armstrong - from his childhood in rural Ohio, through aerial combat in Korea, to his first steps on the Moon.

programme.title: Black in Space: Breaking the Color Barrier
programme.desc: The Civil Rights Movement collided with the Space Race as America battled to beat the Soviets to become the first nation to send a black astronaut into orbit.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: From the earliest days of space exploration to humankinds latest endeavors, risk is always part of the equation.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: For decades, NASA and Soviet engineers and designers have struggled to build machines that can withstand the unforgivable heat and unthinkable speeds caused by re-entry into our atmosphere.

programme.title: Fantastic Friends

programme.title: Fantastic Friends

programme.desc: In Poland, Sophie trades a calm weekend for a rush of adventure: trekking the towering Tatras, rafting wild rivers, uncovering a legendary salt mine, and so much more!

programme.title: Americas Wild Ss
programme.desc: Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed
programme.desc: As the dry season begins, thousands of animals are making their way to the Acacia Loop. Each must establish their place in the pecking order and avoid the dangerous residents.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs
programme.desc: A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: Follow vet Dr. Amanda Salb and her dedicated team as they rehabilitate and release injured and abandoned animals, big and small, back to the wild.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon
programme.desc: A manmade lake in Minneriya National Park supports the largest concentration of elephants in Asia.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: Take an exhilarating trek through a range of African landscapes where survival is by no means guaranteed.

programme.title: Americas Wild Ss
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.desc: Strap in for a thrilling ride as Lizzie travels by air, land, and sea to meet Alaskan wildlife and visit the worlds remotest corners. Eavesdrop on underwater Arctic residents with scientists, dine with polar bears, and scavenge with bald eagles.

programme.desc: Trek through the Canadian rainforest, look up at dizzying redwood trees, and explore giant kelp forests with Lizzie as she experiences the wild west coast of North America. Cross paths with wolves and bears while salmon travel upstream to lay eggs.

programme.desc: Monsoon storms sweep over the tropical island of Sri Lanka, and water carried in with swirling mists hits the mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the many changing faces of the forests.

programme.desc: At the waters edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins..

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: Sound waves are produced by movement. Animals have evolved organs to detect those sound waves in the air or water to perceive movements in their environment.

programme.title: Arabian Seas
programme.desc: The seas are alive with carnivores. Meet the sharks and rays who patrol the coral reefs, hunting down their prey. Learn about toxic fish who disguise themselves to ambush the unwary.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Tasmanian Devil
programme.desc: For Tasmanian devils, dominance is the name of the game during mating season. Meet males who fight for the right to pass on their genes.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Who will be the winner? Newt really wants to win a gold star at the gym, but she keeps losing. Lulu is so excited for the funfair that she keeps jumping the line and upsetting her friends. Bubbles accidentally scrapes the paint on Jeffs ceiling and tries to fix it herself. At bedtime, Pogo wants to play, but everyone else is ready to sleep.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: From stopping bullies to fixing broken toys, theres no problem too big or small for Morphle! In this magical adventure, Milas pet morphs into all sorts of incredible things-a giant construction vehicle, a speeding race car, a mighty T-Rex-to help people and protect the city. Its a showcase of Morphles most amazing and heroic transformations.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: An unusual wave of mayhem is sweeping through Petport, and the resulting chaos is making all the babies incredibly cranky! Its up to Mila and Morphle to fix the problems and restore peace. Their mission begins when they confront a giant pizza monster terrorizing the streets. Just as they solve that, a giant robot starts rampaging through the city, adding to the cranky-inducing chaos they must stop.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Welcome to the learning city farm! Help Ella count all the buses as they drive by. Join Grandma Mei for a fun and active dance session. Make a healthy salad while dancing the salsa and learn how to recycle to save the planet. Plus, learn a silly song to cheer up a friend and celebrate everything that grows with the Growing Song.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for some singing fun at Lellobee City Farm! Learn your ABCs in the Boogie Barn and then learn how to wash your hands before eating some delicious dumplings. Help Ella play Mummy Duck and keep all the baby ducks together. When accidents happen, sing a boo boo song to feel better. End the day with a special Chinese lullaby from Grandma Mei at a sleepover.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: The school bell is ringing for the very first time for JJ! Join him on the exciting journey of his first day of school. Hell learn how to ride the bus, meet his friendly teacher, and make a whole new group of friends. This story shows that school is a wonderful place for learning, playing, and making new memories.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Youre invited to an animal dance party! Join the Animal Song and dance with creatures from the forest, farm and jungle. See the race between the Tortoise and the Hare, then hop along with the little bunnies. Visit the farm to sing with Old MacDonalds animals, the black sheep and all the friends in the dell. Find the little duckies who are hiding and play with a hip hippo down by the lake.

programme.title: Nina Time
programme.desc: Get ready for a Pet Store Woof! Nina and her dad take a trip to the pet store, where her dog, Patas, uses his woofs to tell them everything he needs. Nina sings the Finger Family song as she helps her family members find their missing things. She challenges her friends to a soccer game and has a special secret on Nochebuena. Plus, she goes on an adventure with her stuffed bunny and builds a new paper doll friend with her Abuelita.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Join Baby John on a musical safari to meet incredible animals! The story begins on the farm, where he sings with the cows and sheep. Then, the adventure takes a bigger turn with a trip to the zoo to see even more amazing creatures. Its a fun-filled tale celebrating the wonderful animal kingdom.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Exploring the world is fun, but its also important to be safe! Baby John learns that some things are a no no, like touching a hot stove or running into the street without looking. Through gentle guidance and a catchy song, he discovers that rules are there to help keep him safe and sound while he plays.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Lets love our planet with Blippi and friends! In a special musical episode, they sing all about recycling and taking care of the Earth. Blippi and Meekah build the ultimate playground, the Blippi Clubhouse! Then, join an adventure down a river as a boulder becomes sand and travel back in time to see how even the smallest dinosaur can be a big help. Blippi also learns about lions and how to mix colors to paint a beautiful rainbow.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is a wonderful place! Join Blippi Wonders as he learns about creatures of all shapes and sizes. He discovers how a caterpillar turns into a butterfly, why a camel has a hump, and what makes a whale so big. From the jungle to the farm, its an animal adventure full of fun and fascinating facts.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Spend a day in the life of Buster! He plays a prank at the carwash and when his friend Scout gets a boo boo, he becomes Dr. Buster. He plays pirates in the soft play area with his mommy and friend Ash. Its sports day at school and Buster learns its not all about winning. He also deals with a wobbly tooth, plays cops and robbers and rescues a runaway train.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Its always a fun time with friends! Buster and Scout get lost in a hedge maze and have to work together to get out. The friends have a water balloon fight, play a big soccer game and help a family of ducks cross the road. When Buster gets sick, he learns about washing his hands. Plus, he spends a special day painting and playing with his mommy.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Sing along with JJ and his friends! Work together to build a giant pillow fort and then go on a fun family vacation in a camper van. Do amazing science experiments with TomTom and YoYo and learn how to make the perfect peanut butter and jelly sandwich. Take a trip to the train park with your grandparents and learn how to take good care of Bingo the dog.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Its JJs Animal Time and theres so much to do! Join Wally as he directs a play version of Hey Diddle Diddle. Go on a treasure hunt to find the keys to unlock a mysterious chest. Help Little Red Riding JJ avoid Wally the Wolfs silly traps. Then, blast off in a rocketship to play tag with the stars. Its a day of fun, friendship and adventure with all of JJs animal pals!

programme.title: Nina Time
programme.desc: Get ready for Ninas song and dance! The friends dance with all the baby animals at the petting zoo. They go on a scavenger hunt to find flowers that match the colors of the rainbow. They dream of flying high in the sky like their pilot dad. Nina chases a surprise egg through the grocery store and tries to catch bubbles without popping them. Plus, she celebrates her birthday with a piata and learns some healthy habits.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Mila and Morphle are hoping for a peaceful day of projects, starting with planting a vegetable garden. But when their magic seeds sprout into enormous, uncontrollable veggies, their plans get complicated! Their day is further interrupted when they must stop Orphle, who is recklessly driving a construction digger and threatening to ruin their garden and their entry for the town baking contest.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Theres trouble in the city, and Officer Morphle is on patrol! His day starts when he has to stop a giant baby from causing chaos. The capers continue as he must then chase down a giant, runaway globe thats rolling through the streets. From stopping pesky bandits to solving mysteries, its a day full of action and adventure for the bravest cop car in town.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: The crew becomes knights for a day when they travel to the Medieval Planet and Orbit volunteers to be king, but he soon learns being the boss isnt as easy as it looks. After finishing their favorite storybook, the friends cant wait for the sequel, so they travel to the Story Planet to live out their own epic adventure.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: The adventure begins when Rob and the gang travel to the Ocean Planet to find a new friend for Emas lonely pet fish. After their hard work, they head to the Playground Planet for a reward, but they get so caught up in their games that they forget to include poor Orbit!

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Its time to learn about numbers, sounds and colors! The friends fly colorful fish kites at the park and bake some yummy cookies. They play with five little speckled frogs and five little green monster bottles. They learn about all the sounds that different vehicles make, how to say hello with a wave and what sounds different instruments make.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready to sing your heart out with Mia! She and her friend Bari pretend to be bakers and make yummy cupcakes. She and her dad take a splashy ride in her car on a rainy day. She and her friend Maple learn about big and small while playing in the garden. She also learns about avocados, kangaroos and how to make her own instruments.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Get ready for some friendly competition! Arpo and Daniel are challenged by Nannybot and her baby to a series of exciting contests. The action kicks off with an epic go-kart race that gets more outrageous with every lap. The challenges continue with a variety of sports and games where both teams try to outsmart and outperform each other. Its a fun-filled story about sportsmanship, rivalry, and pulling out all the stops to win.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Brace yourself for a series of wacky inventions and robotic mishaps! Arpo faces everything from a harmless kitchen timer he mistakes for a bomb to a drone that wont leave him alone. When a multiplying ray gets into the wrong hands, it creates more trouble than anyone can handle. These adventures are a fun look at how technology and curiosity can lead to the most unexpected and comical situations.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Get ready for some Baby Bus Mayhem! Baby Truck and Molly learn the importance of sharing their toys. A magic show takes a turn when Yellow Mechanical gets stuck to a giant magnet. At firefighter school, Dandy gets himself into a tricky situation. Weasel causes trouble by cheating in a football match and showing off his faulty gadgets at the fix-up fair, but Gecko and Grandma are there to save the day.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Meet the newest member of the garage crew: Baby Bus! This story follows her on her very first day. Shes a little nervous, but with the help of Gecko and her new friends, she learns all about her important job and discovers the unique things that she can do. Its a sweet tale about finding your place and being proud of who you are.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Oh no, theres an emergency! But dont worry, the lifesavers are here. Baby John learns about the incredible jobs that firefighters and police officers do to help people. He sees how they use their special vehicles and tools to keep the entire neighborhood safe, a thrilling tribute to our brave community heroes.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Follow our favorite curious baby, Baby John, through a day of exciting discoveries. Watch him learn new things during playtime, interact with his loving family at the dinner table, and get ready for bed after a long and happy day of fun. Its a heartwarming look at the small but wonderful moments in a babys day.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for a teddy bear panic! Pogo accidentally ruins Newts special teddy bear-shaped hedge and isnt sure if he should tell the truth. Jeff has to overcome his fear of mud to get his favorite feather duster back. Bubbles wants to take a picture with a big purple star and builds a rocket to get to it. Pogo tries to surprise his friends with ice cream, but it keeps melting.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Its party time with Pogo! Hes invited to Jeffs party, but they cant agree on what kind of party it should be. Bubbles invents a new bouncy blob that gets out of control. When Lulu loses her favorite bunny, Bubbles becomes her superhero and helps her find it. Plus, Fuse learns that eating his greens will give him more energy.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: This story is a celebration of family! Follow JJ through a day spent with the people he loves most. He sings a special song for his mommy and another for his daddy, showing how much he appreciates them. Its a heartwarming tale about the joy and love that comes from being with your family.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Have some fun and dance with JJ and his friends! Put on your firefighter hat and dance, then celebrate the sights and sounds of spring. Sing about yummy vegetables, colorful jello and how much you love your friends. Go on a big adventure with Jack the Mouse as he climbs a giant beanstalk and dance with Ramona the seal from the circus.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Being a good friend is the best! Join JJ as he learns some very important lessons. When his friends want to play, he discovers the joy of sharing. Through a day of play, he learns that saying please and thank you and being kind makes every game more fun for everyone.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for some singing fun at Lellobee City Farm! Learn your ABCs in the Boogie Barn and then learn how to wash your hands before eating some delicious dumplings. Help Ella play Mummy Duck and keep all the baby ducks together. When accidents happen, sing a boo boo song to feel better. End the day with a special Chinese lullaby from Grandma Mei at a sleepover.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its always cool to be cool on Lellobee City Farm! A penguin visits and teaches everyone how to stay cool on a hot day. A new rooster is having trouble remembering how to crow, but Ella helps him figure it out. The ducklings have their first flying lesson and the friends clean out the pond to give the animals a nice new home. Plus, celebrate the Moon Festival with a special party.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle
programme.desc: Lets learn about colors and shapes! Twinkle has fun painting a picture with lots of different colors. She and her friends learn all about the colors of the rainbow, first with some baby birds, then on a rainbow slide and finally with a rainbow bubble bath. They build a tower with rainbow stones and learn all about the different shapes of the clouds.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle
programme.desc: Get ready for some fun and learning with Twinkle! She builds a sandcastle and learns about different shapes. She plants some seeds and watches them grow into beautiful flowers. She finds some colorful balloons and learns to count. She also learns about animal sounds, different kinds of fruit and how to make music. Plus, the friends build a snowman and play a fun game of peek-a-boo.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Can you solve the riddle of the ruins? The crew goes on a real-life expedition to the Explorer Planet, but the trip goes off track when Orbit loses his lucky coin. To celebrate Intergalactic Talk Like a Pirate Day, the friends travel to the Buccaneer Planet, but an overly bossy pirate takes all the fun out of their adventure.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Lets go to space camp! The gang rockets to the Camping Planet where Ema and TK get set to teach Rob and Orbit all about camping. After their trip, everyone is looking forward to a sleepover on the Bedtime Planet, but theres one problem: Orbit forgot to mention he has bad dreams when he doesnt sleep in his own bed.

programme.title: The Sharksons
programme.desc: Get ready to sing along with the Sharksons! When Baby Grub gets a boo-boo, Mummy Shark is there to make it all better. The friends bake a delicious cake for Old McDugong. All mummys are superheroes and the friends sing a song to say thank you. Plus, they play pass the parcel at a party, build an underwater ball pit and learn that teamwork makes the dream work.

programme.title: The Sharksons
programme.desc: Its time to do the recycling dance! The Sharksons learn how to sort trash into the right bins with a fun dance. Baby Grub goes on a shark hunt to learn about all the different kinds of sharks. When Grub gets sick, Stanley puts on a shadow puppet show to cheer her up. The friends have a pirate party for Grubs birthday and learn about musical instruments at school.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: As the day comes to a close, its time for Baby John to get ready for bed. This peaceful story follows his calming bedtime routine, from taking a warm bath and putting on his pajamas to listening to a sweet lullaby from his parents. Its a gentle journey that shows how a calm routine can lead to a wonderful nights sleep.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its time to wind down with JJ. Follow his soothing bedtime routine, from taking a warm bath to brushing his teeth. As he looks out his window at the night sky, he sings Twinkle Twinkle Little Star before snuggling into bed for a sweet lullaby. Its a peaceful and relaxing journey into dreamland.

programme.title: Cody Time
programme.desc: Cody has amazing friends and they have great adventures together! He and JJ imagine theyre in an extreme motor trike race. He and Cece go on a nature walk and help a lost duckling find its home. During recess, Cody plays with all the other Melon Patch kids. Even when hes alone, Cody has fun playing with his favorite blankie and making leaf crowns in the autumn leaves.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Are you ready to dance? A magical mirror creates colorful chaos and fluffy cloud sheep come down to play! Take a ride on a bus driven by a fun-loving monkey and try to keep a sneaky wolf away from your alphabet cupcakes. Go on a pirate adventure on the high seas, play peekaboo with safari animals and make funny faces on your breakfast pancakes.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day for an animal adventure! Join JJ as he visits a farm to sing Old MacDonald with all the animals. The fun continues as he learns about the sounds animals make and dances along with them. This musical story is a delightful journey into the wonderful world of our furry and feathered friends.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready to use your pedal power! Newt and her friends ride their bikes on an adventure to find a real-life Flutterbug. Pogo wants to pick a yummy Mang-Mang fruit, but he has to learn to be patient and wait for it to ripen. Jeff gets a cute but messy houseguest and Fuse has to be brave when he hears spooky noises in the night.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Its party time with Pogo! Hes invited to Jeffs party, but they cant agree on what kind of party it should be. Bubbles invents a new bouncy blob that gets out of control. When Lulu loses her favorite bunny, Bubbles becomes her superhero and helps her find it. Plus, Fuse learns that eating his greens will give him more energy.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: The ultimate game of tag is on! Morphle and his mischievous green counterpart, Orphle, are chasing each other all over the city. Their playful rivalry escalates as they morph into anything they can imagine-a speedy race car, a soaring jet, a stomping T-Rex-to tag each other. Its a thrilling, fast-paced chase from start to finish.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: A wave of monster truck madness is taking over Petport! The mischievous Orphle is using his magic to transform every vehicle he sees-from fire engines to ice cream vans-into giant, rumbling monster trucks. To stop the city-wide destruction and return things to normal, Morphle must morph into a series of powerful monster trucks himself and challenge his naughty twin in a high-octane showdown.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to explore Earth and nature! A frog ballerina shows Ella that rain can be fun and is important for the farm. The friends celebrate Earth Day by litter picking and composting. When some of the animals get sick, Ella helps the vet at a makeshift animal hospital. Plus, watch a caterpillar turn into a butterfly and learn some yoga moves with Rishis mom.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for some singing fun at Lellobee City Farm! Learn your ABCs in the Boogie Barn and then learn how to wash your hands before eating some delicious dumplings. Help Ella play Mummy Duck and keep all the baby ducks together. When accidents happen, sing a boo boo song to feel better. End the day with a special Chinese lullaby from Grandma Mei at a sleepover.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready to learn with JJ! Embark on a musical journey that starts with the ABC Song, making it fun to learn every letter. Once youve mastered the alphabet, the adventure continues with a trip back in time to count from one to ten with a group of silly dinosaurs. Its a fun-filled lesson that makes learning feel like a game.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Get ready to sing along with the animals! Go on a submarine ride and learn about colors with a family of sharks. JJ hosts a talent show where all his friends can show off their special skills. The friends learn that they are all special in their own way and Humpty Dumpty has a great fall. Play a game of Duck, Duck, Goose, and help Boba find some food when his tummy is rumbling.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Grab your instrument and march along to John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt! Get into the holiday spirit with Up on the Housetop and Deck the Halls. Make a splash down by the bay and get active with fun exercise dance moves. Crawl like the Itsy Bitsy Spider, swim with the mermaids and do the Chuchuwa dance. Its a musical marching adventure!

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its a yes yes day for fun! This energetic adventure follows Baby John and his friends as they have a blast at the playground. They learn to say yes to sharing their toys, yes to taking turns on the slide, and yes to being kind to one another. Its a joyful celebration of friendship and playing together.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its time to learn some healthy habits! The friends have an exciting day at the pool and learn how to be safe while having fun. They play with Humpty Dumpty, who loves extreme sports and try to keep him from breaking. Jill learns to swim like a mermaid and Baby John learns to love his vegetables. Plus, they build and break a piata and have a fun toy car race.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Get ready for some thrilling adventures with Blippi Wonders! This journey is packed with excitement and learning. Discover how a firetruck and a police car work, learn about the sticky science of glue, and see the amazing power of magnets. Its a fun-filled exploration of the amazing things that make our world work.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Get ready to explore planet Earth with Blippi Wonders! This series of adventures delves into the science of our world. Learn about how trees grow, what makes a volcano erupt, and why some things sink while others float. With the help of his trusty friends, Blippi makes learning about nature and science an unforgettable journey.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Get ready for fun and games with Buster! He gets caught in a storm but bravely rescues his friend Scout. He plays with balloons and floats high into the sky! He imagines hes a fish in the ocean and a cowboy in the Wild West. He even plays skittles, goes to a soft play center for hide and seek and helps stop a runaway train.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Join Buster on some magical adventures! He and his friend Rita race away from an erupting volcano. He stands up to a bully and uses his superpowers to rescue his best friend, Scout. He finds a magic spellbook, but learns that magic is harder than it looks. He also becomes a hero fire truck, goes on a treasure hunt and blasts off into space as a rocket bus!

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Its time for some sing-along fun! A tiny spider is determined to get a drink from a lemonade stand. JJ goes on a big adventure when he buys some magic beans that grow into a giant beanstalk. The friends play a game of hide-and-seek and JJ spends the day with his bestie, Boba the bear. After a fun day, its time to have a clean-up dance party!

programme.title: Cody Time
programme.desc: Sing along with Cody through all of lifes moments! He moves to a new house and when he feels nervous, his family helps him get excited. When Cody gets sick, his mom takes care of him. After a bad dream, his parents show him all the things that make him feel safe. He learns that goodbye isnt forever and gets inspired by his fathers story about Anansi the spider to help others.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Its JJs Animal Time and theres so much to do! Join Wally as he directs a play version of Hey Diddle Diddle. Go on a treasure hunt to find the keys to unlock a mysterious chest. Help Little Red Riding JJ avoid Wally the Wolfs silly traps. Then, blast off in a rocketship to play tag with the stars. Its a day of fun, friendship and adventure with all of JJs animal pals!

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Yeehaw! Its time for Jordies cowboy party, but the Wild West has nothing on this chaos! The party guests, including Mila and Morphle, must first deal with a giant baby who is causing a ruckus. The wild adventures continue as they chase a runaway globe and try to stop a naughty monster truck, making it a birthday party bonanza that no one will ever forget.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Mila and Morphle are having a day focused on helping little ones, but their plans are thrown into chaos by one baby-sized problem after another! First, they have to spring into action to save a friends baby carriage when it starts rolling away. Soon after, they discover a group of adorable but naughty baby Morphles running wild through the city, forcing them to find a way to round them all up safely.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: After days of rain in space, the crew decides they need to chill out and travel to the Weather Planet to find some sunshine. Their next adventure begins when they find a treasure map and head to Buccaneer Planet, only to discover they arent the only ones searching for pirate gold.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Its time to be music makers! When TK breaks her guitar, the friends head off to the Repair Shop Planet, where they discover you dont need fancy instruments to make music, just a little imagination! Later, when the gangs favorite video game breaks, the crew heads to Arcade Planet, where Rob learns theres a lot more to having fun than playing by yourself.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Its time to learn about numbers, sounds and colors! The friends fly colorful fish kites at the park and bake some yummy cookies. They play with five little speckled frogs and five little green monster bottles. They learn about all the sounds that different vehicles make, how to say hello with a wave and what sounds different instruments make.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready for Mias spectacular sing-along! She and her friends see five little speckled frogs at the pond. The big bus gets all muddy and the friends have to work together to get it clean. They go on a fun train ride and Mia has to get her favorite bunny clean after it gets all muddy. Plus, learn about shapes, names and what to do when it rains.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: When Baby Daniel is around, chaos is sure to follow! Join Arpo as he navigates a series of baby-made messes. Whether Daniel is turning the bathroom into a bubble-filled wonderland, making a sticky disaster while baking cookies, or causing a ruckus with a runaway vacuum cleaner, Arpo is always there to save the day. Its a hilarious look at the messes and mischief that come with taking care of a very curious baby.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: With his new teaching chip, Arpo is on a mission to educate Daniel about the world around him. Together, they learn crucial safety skills, like what to do during an earthquake or a fire. Their lessons also venture into the realm of science, as they explore the power of magnets, the mystery of electricity, and even what to do when a scary monster appears! This is an educational and exciting journey where safety and science become a fun-filled playtime.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Theres always something exciting happening at Geckos Garage! Today, a cement mixer has made a big mess, and a monster truck has a flat tire. Gecko must use all his tools and skills to help his vehicle friends get back on the road. Its a story about problem-solving and the joy of helping others.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Even the best mechanic needs help sometimes! In this story, Gecko faces a problem thats too big for him to handle alone. But luckily, he has a garage full of fantastic friends. They all come together, combining their different strengths and skills to help Gecko save the day. Its a powerful tale of community and friendship.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Why just play when you can sing along, too? Every game and activity comes with its own special song in this fun-filled adventure. Join Baby John and his friends as they turn a trip to the park and a day in the classroom into a mini-musical, showing how a good song can make any moment more fun.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Baby John has a new ice cream machine! He makes treats for his family but adds some unusual ingredients. He also plays vet with Bingo and sings a special song about his sister, Jill. Mom teaches him how to be safe during bathtime and he and Manny have a superhero competition. Plus, the friends go to the movies for the first time and have a swimming race.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for some pumpkin munch mayhem! Newt has grown a giant pumpkin for Halloween, but a hungry Wrigglepillar keeps trying to eat it. In a football game, Bubbles cheats to help her team win. Jeff is excited for a dancing game, but Fuse wont listen to the instructions and ruins the fun.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for a teddy bear panic! Pogo accidentally ruins Newts special teddy bear-shaped hedge and isnt sure if he should tell the truth. Jeff has to overcome his fear of mud to get his favorite feather duster back. Bubbles wants to take a picture with a big purple star and builds a rocket to get to it. Pogo tries to surprise his friends with ice cream, but it keeps melting.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Join JJ on a magical carousel ride where his imagination turns him into a brave knight! When hes feeling scared, Dad helps him blast off in a pretend rocketship. Build an amazing maze for Jellybean the hamster, put on sunscreen at the beach and play a fun game of Peek-a-Boo. Then, become a detective and help solve the mystery of who took the cookies from the cookie jar!

programme.title: Cody Time
programme.desc: Singing is always fun with Cody and his friends! He uses his imagination to play with a simple cardboard box and solves a mystery of ten missing buses. When Cody gets upset, he learns to handle his emotions in a healthy way. He has a playdate with Nina where they learn the value of sharing, helps his dad cook delicious vegetables and discovers that even when plans dont work out, friends can make any day a special day.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day for an animal adventure! Join JJ as he visits a farm to sing Old MacDonald with all the animals. The fun continues as he learns about the sounds animals make and dances along with them. This musical story is a delightful journey into the wonderful world of our furry and feathered friends.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for a farming sing-along! When Ella is feeling anxious, she does the five senses shakedown to feel better. She and Rishi play a game of I Hear With My Little Ear to find all the animals on the farm. Do the ABC dance, go stargazing with Grandma Mei and take care of five mischievous monkeys. Plus, learn that its okay to make mistakes and that tidying up can be fun.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to do the scarecrow dance! Help Sunny the Scarecrow scare away some pesky pigeons to protect the farms crops. Its harvest time, so everyone helps pick the vegetables. Find a safe and quiet place for a hedgehog to hibernate for the winter. Plus, sing a song about Pablo the Pig and Carlos the Calf and get ready for a campfire sing-along.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle
programme.desc: Lets learn about colors and shapes! Twinkle has fun painting a picture with lots of different colors. She and her friends learn all about the colors of the rainbow, first with some baby birds, then on a rainbow slide and finally with a rainbow bubble bath. They build a tower with rainbow stones and learn all about the different shapes of the clouds.

programme.title: Playtime With Twinkle
programme.desc: Twinkle loves playtime and so do her friends! They bounce high on a trampoline and learn about safety. They play with musical instruments and find a surprise music box in the forest. They discover an umbrella and learn how to use it to stay dry in the rain. They also have fun with wobbly Jello, squeaky shoes and making funny faces in the mirror.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Get ready for a dinosaur roar! The gang ventures off to Dinosaur Planet in search of real-life dinosaurs, but Robs over-enthusiasm soon leads them into dino-sized trouble! Afterwards, the friends travel to the Astronomy Planet to see a rare comet, but when the high-powered telescope breaks, they learn sometimes simpler is better.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Theres a new sheriff in town! What could be more fun than going to the Old West Planet to play REAL cowboys? Unfortunately, Ema gets a little carried away in her new role as sheriff. After their western adventure, the crew heads to the Beach Planet and encounters a hermit crab that has lost its shell!

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: After a long day, its time for some quiet time. Baby John learns all about the bones in his body from Mr. Skeleton. The whole family tries to sleep in one big bed. Baby John goes on an adventure to the moon with a star and his stuffed animals. The kids build a carriage to get across the London Bridge and Jill and her friends have a princess pampering day.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Wind down your day with an evening sing-along! When the stars dont come out, TomTom finds a creative way to make a starry night for JJ. The kids challenge their parents to a fun soccer match. Get excited for the first day back at school where youll learn all about fire drills, make a colorful kaleidoscope and see that its okay when accidents happen.

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of the Oddbods! This collection of bite-size adventures follows seven colorful friends with very big, and very different, personalities. Whether its Fuses hot-headedness, Pogos pranks, or Zees laziness, their unique traits clash in spectacular fashion. Watch as simple, everyday situations spiral into unpredictable and hilarious mayhem, proving that with the Oddbods, life is never, ever dull.

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of the Oddbods! This collection of bite-size adventures follows seven colorful friends with very big, and very different, personalities. Whether its Fuses hot-headedness, Pogos pranks, or Zees laziness, their unique traits clash in spectacular fashion. Watch as simple, everyday situations spiral into unpredictable and hilarious mayhem, proving that with the Oddbods, life is never, ever dull.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Sing along with JJ and his friends! Work together to build a giant pillow fort and then go on a fun family vacation in a camper van. Do amazing science experiments with TomTom and YoYo and learn how to make the perfect peanut butter and jelly sandwich. Take a trip to the train park with your grandparents and learn how to take good care of Bingo the dog.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Beep, beep! Its time for a vehicle adventure. Hop aboard the bus with JJ and sing about its wheels, wipers, and horn. The journey continues as he discovers cars of every color and other amazing machines that vroom and zoom. Its a high-energy story celebrating all the things that go.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Youre invited to an animal dance party! Join the Animal Song and dance with creatures from the forest, farm and jungle. See the race between the Tortoise and the Hare, then hop along with the little bunnies. Visit the farm to sing with Old MacDonalds animals, the black sheep and all the friends in the dell. Find the little duckies who are hiding and play with a hip hippo down by the lake.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its time to get ready to go out! Baby John learns how to tie his own shoes. He collects all the dirty socks in the house to put on a puppet show. He gets a new pair of light-up shoes, but the lights stop working when he gets them wet. Jill has a fashion parade with the family and they all go on a road trip in a camper van. Plus, Baby John learns how to get ready for his swimming lessons.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Get ready for some fun in the mud! Jill tries to keep Baby John and Bingo from playing in the mud, but she ends up joining in on the fun. The boys have a healthy competition at a fruit-themed play park. Baby John has a fun playdate with his grandpa and his vintage motorbike. Mom helps Baby John get ready for school and the family helps him learn that its okay to ask for help.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Pita VHS itu adalah rakaman video Cikgu Mus dan Cikgu Aini Ketika mereka jadi pelajar pada tahun 1998. Kedua-duanya amat akrab dan sering membuat kerenah di sekolah, sehinggalah kemunculan Assuntha Devi.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Mal terus berusaha menyakat Chelsea. Tapi Adam sudah semakin rapat dengan Chelsea. Chelsea mula sedar bergaduh dengan Mal kerja sia-sia. Tapi Mal tak peduli.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Konflik Mal dan Cikgu Aini Kembali. Mal ungkit tentang rakaman pita VHS. Itu membuatkan Mal Kembali sedar apa dia lakukan pada Chelsea adalah kerja sia-sia. Mal mula untuk meminta maaf pada semua orang.

programme.title: FYP: Famili Yang Popular
programme.desc: Jiran mereka, Maimun turut berangan untuk menyertai anugerah FYP. Dalam masa yang sama, Bonda mengamuk apabila dapat tahu Irlan sedang hanyut dilamun cinta dengan peminatnya, Natrah.

programme.desc: Mal terus berusaha menyakat Chelsea. Tapi Adam sudah semakin rapat dengan Chelsea. Chelsea mula sedar bergaduh dengan Mal kerja sia-sia. Tapi Mal tak peduli.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Mal dituduh membuat onar pada kereta Cikgu Annuar. Adam dan Alya membantu Mal untuk membersihkan namanya sebelum dia digantung sekolah. Mal mahu tahu siapakah yang membuat fitnah padanya.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Kemunculan Miss A di internet yang cuba menjatuhkan reputasi Mal membuatkan dia paranoid. Dia cuba siasat semua pelajar dengan nama bermula huruf A, termasuklah Arif dan Adam.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Mal akhirnya tahu siapakah gerangan Miss A yang menyimpan dendam padanya. Mal nak cuba balas apa yang Miss A lakukan padanya dengan bantuan Adam.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Cikgu Mus , guru kaunseling dijemput ke sekolah. Cikgu Mus adalah kawan sekolah Cikgu Aini yang mempunyai sejarahnya tersendiri. Mal terjumpa pita VHS milik Cikgu Mus yang menyimpan rahsia Cikgu Aini.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the worlds largest and most famous dog show: "Crufts".nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled "Best in Show". These are the loveable family pets competing to win the "Scruffts" title.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Genus Pterophyllum, commonly known as P. scalare, freshwater angelfish or just angelfish is a large tropical fish native to the Amazon River in South America.They have a laterally flattened body, making them suitableto live in the crevices of tree roots in rivers with smooth water flow, and feeds on aquatic insects. The water temperature should be maintained at 26, and should reach 27-28 when breeding. The fertilized eggs are then released and attached to water plants or rocks, and the couple will take care of them together. However, once the eggs are hatched, the bigger ones will eat the smaller ones, hence not suitable to be raised together with other small fishes.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: well be seeing the best penguin fails, p-p-p-party penguins, well get up close and personal with wild animals, and well go on safari. well also meet angry animals living the thug life, some crazy critters, and well watch sporty animals in action.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt is called in to help wildlife rescuer Jean Thorpe care for three abandoned baby hedgehogs, a species whose numbers are dropping alarmingly. When theyre ready for release, he offers them a home in his garden.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Alan Davies returns for a brand-new series of The Dog Rescuers and its going to be bigger and better than ever. On this weeks show, German Shepherd puppies covered in their own mess and eating raw meat off a filthy floor. They need Inspector Herchy Boals help to get them out of their concrete cage.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Sugar gliders have bodies similar to that of a mustelid, and has a long, curly tail that cannot grab anything. Males are larger than females, measuring 25-30 cm long from nose to tail. Their fur is thick and soft, generally bluish-gray in color, but can also be yellow, tan, or white. The area from their nose to the middle of their back is black, while their abdomen, throat and chest are creamy white in color.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve scoured the internet to bring you the most hilarious clips of Budgies (and other birds) on the planet, not so much -whos a clever boy- as -whos a funny boy-! Flying fails, performing Parrots and the real life angry birds -V weve assembled the very best the web has to offer, guaranteed to make you laugh out loud.

programme.title: My House And Other Animals
programme.desc: Meet the modern-day Dr Doolittles with a passion for all creatures great and small: the unsung heroes of the wildlife world, whose homes have become havens for every animal imaginable.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The era of high housing prices shocks the masses. However, some are willing to live in the mountains for their beloved parrots, just to give them the best breeding environment. Parrots have a long lifespan and their IQ is comparable to that of a five-year-old child. How do you make them behave? Training is actually a good way, but how? "Melon seeds" are key to the goal. If you want to raise a parrot, there are in fact many restrictions on choosing the right one. How should I put it? Dont miss "Cute Pet Guide"!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as youve never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAPs, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. Theres a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Baxter is a Shih-Tzu that was discovered abandoned in an empty house on the outskirts of Manchester; thin and with extremely matted fur. Inspector Lyndsey Taylor comes to the rescue, but until all that fur is removed, nobody knows what lies beneath.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The meerkat king from "Madagascar" is funny, but meerkats in real life are well-behaved, cuddly and they heal our hearts! Pocket sized pets are currently all the rage, but there are details you need to pay attention to when raising them. For example, hedgehogs are highly defensive, timid sugar gliders will harm themselves without being next to their owners, and cute guinea pigs like Norman from the movie "The Secret Life of Pets" are easily abandoned due to being easy to obtain and raise, etc. Dont worry, experts will teach you how to raise them! Come to a restaurant in Kaohsiung to get up close with Rocket Raccoon from "The Avengers"!
